description: Get a client's country code/name. For successful usage the file "GeoIP.dat" has to be placed inside the CoD4 directory.

params.name: type
description: 0: Returns a two-character country code as a string (e.g. US, FR)
1: Returns a three-character country code as a string (e.g. USA, FRA)
2: Returns the country name as a string (e.g. United Stated, France)
3: Returns the continent ID as a string (e.g. AN, EU)
4: Returns the index from the DB as an integer
